vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
λῡμαίνομαι,
(λῦμα A)
__A cleanse from dirt, of fullers, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; see at {ἀπολυμαίνομαι}.
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to destroy, damage, ruin ravage
some list as a deponent, λυμαινομαι, to outrage, harm, violently maltreat; in NT to make havoc of, ruin, destroy, damage Acts 8:3*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 傷害, 破壞, 毀滅 (徒 8:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 伤害, 破坏, 毁灭 (徒 8:3)
